thread.section_title: Hotel Joke - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hospitality, Comfort, and Value in Paris
thread.title_full: Hospitality, Comfort, and Value in Paris - Review of Hotel Joke - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: College Bowl
title: Hospitality, Comfort, and Value in Paris
text: Hotel Joke was truly a "home away from home." Clean, quiet and efficiently designed, the bed was extremely comfortable. The buffet breakfast included with the room was excellent with many choices. One only needed one other meal daily. Snacks and drinks are available all day. The staff understands hospitality and guests are treated like family. Convenient to transportation and dining. Unbeatable value. Hats off and special thanks to Sophia and Artaud.
